hero.name: Ismail Ali
hero.tagline: Designing fast, responsive, and user-friendly websites that bring ideas to life.

about.about_description: I'm a passionate Frontend and WordPress Developer with a Master's degree in Information Technology. With over a year of professional experience, I specialize in creating modern, responsive websites that deliver exceptional user experiences.
about.about_journey: My journey in web development began with a strong foundation in computer science, and I've since honed my skills in React.js, WordPress, and modern web technologies. I'm passionate about creating clean, efficient code and beautiful user interfaces.
about.about_current: Currently working at Appiesoft Web Solutions, I'm focused on expanding my expertise and seeking opportunities to work internationally, particularly in Europe and the UAE, where I can contribute to innovative projects and grow as a developer.

skills.title: Skills & Technologies
skills.subtitle: Technologies and tools I use to build beautiful, performant web experiences.
skills.alwaysLearningText: I'm constantly exploring new technologies and frameworks to stay current with the latest trends in web development. Currently diving deeper into Next.js, TypeScript, and advanced React patterns to enhance my development capabilities.

projects.title: My Projects
projects.subtitle: A collection of projects I've worked on, showcasing my skills and experience.

project1.title: Modern Portfolio Website
project1.description: A responsive portfolio website built with React.js and TailwindCSS, featuring smooth animations and modern design.

project2.title: E-commerce WordPress Site
project2.description: A fully functional e-commerce website using WordPress and WooCommerce with custom Elementor designs.

project3.title: React Web Application
project3.description: A dynamic web application built with React.js, featuring modern UI components and responsive design.

experience.title: Work Experience
experience.subtitle: My professional journey and the roles I've held.

exp1.title: Frontend Developer
exp1.description: Developing and maintaining modern web applications using React.js, WordPress, and other frontend technologies.
exp1.responsibility1: Develop responsive and interactive user interfaces using React.js
exp1.responsibility2: Build and customize WordPress websites with Elementor and WooCommerce
exp1.responsibility3: Collaborate with team members to deliver high-quality web solutions

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.subtitle: Have a project in mind? Let's work together to bring your ideas to life.

info.title: Contact Information
info.description: Feel free to reach out if you have any questions or would like to discuss a project. I'm always open to new opportunities and collaborations.

footer.aboutText: Frontend & WordPress Developer passionate about creating exceptional web experiences that make a difference.
